response.reasoning: Now that we've clicked the Global Memory button, I can see a modal showing various assets and files that have been saved globally in the organization. This seems to be a central repository of project assets with search capabilities and different views. Let's extract information about this feature to understand its role in the platform's knowledge management system.

tool_parameters.instruction: Extract information about the Global Memory modal including: 1) The search functionality 2) Types of content/assets visible 3) Filtering and sorting options 4) Organization of content (Global memory vs Project assets) 5) Available actions (Add New) 6) File/asset types supported (Image + 6 More dropdown) 7) Any metadata shown for assets (Added by, Newest to oldest)

response.next_plan: After understanding the Global Memory feature, we'll explore the 'Add New' functionality and then look at the different content type options available in the 'Image + 6 More' dropdown to understand the platform's asset management capabilities.
